main event: A round-shaped object was observed in Winston-Salem, North Carolina for 40 minutes, described as blue, orange, and red, oscillating in motion.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 40 minutes,The object changed colors during the sighting,The observer described the object as being similar to a hot air balloon,It was reported that college students released plastic bags to create hot air for the observation,Similar reports from the area indicated that this was not an isolated incident.
sighted object: one round-shaped object that was blue, orange, and red
